General.Name: Radiant Globaltech Bhd
General.Description: Radiant Globaltech Berhad, an investment holding company, offers retail technology software solutions. It operates in two segments, Hardware and Maintenance, and Software. The company offers retail management software, such as Retail B2B Procurement Portal, AX Retail Consignment portal, and AX Mobile System. It also provides Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, an enterprise resource planning solution; LS Central, front-end point-of sales (POS) solution in retail, and food and beverage industries; and LS Express, a web POS with powerful accounting and back-office functionalities. In addition, the company offers retail hardware and support services. Further, it is involved in marketing, sale, and installation of hardware for the retail industry and provision of maintenance for the hardware and software products and solutions; design, development, marketing, sale, enhancement, customization, and implementation of third party software and in-house software; and provision of management consultancy, computer programming, and other information technology services. The company serves retail chains and convenience stores, as well as fast moving consumer goods brands, food and beverage chains, manufacturers, transportation and logistics, and utilities providers. It operates in Australia, Cambodia, China, Hong Kong, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, Brunei, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom, Chile, the United States, and Yemen. The company was formerly known as Axiome Protal Sdn Bhd and changed its name to Radiant Globaltech Berhad in August 2017. Radiant Globaltech Berhad was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
